title: Introduction
text: My name is Kate Brown, and this is my website. I am a first-year ScM student in Biostatistics at the Bloomberg School of Public Health at Johns Hopkins. In my free time, I enjoy reading, traveling, and spending time outside.

title: About
text: I recently graduated from Lehigh University with a BS in population health and a minor in probability and statistics.

title: About
text: I recently graduated from Lehigh University with a BS in population health and a minor in probability and statistics.

title: About
text:
Research Experience
In the past, I have completed research in many fields, including writing a paper about the Moroccan healthcare system and co-authoring a journal about forecasting trajectories of infectious diseases by combining forecasts from computational models and human judgment. I also had to complete a capstone project while at Lehigh and for this project I created an exposure measurement based on a survey that was conducted to collect demographic and personal information on American Indian individuals and their experience with COVID-19.
